mapper.insert: insert into merchant( mid, mname, mage, maddress, memail, mphone, description, createBy, createDate, company ) values( #{mid}, #{mname}, #{mage}, #{maddress}, #{memail}, #{mphone}, #{description}, #{createBy}, #{createDate}, #{company} )
mapper.select:
select count(*) from merchant
mname like '%' #{mname} '%'
and mphone like '%' #{mphone} '%'
and maddress like '%' #{maddress} '%'
and description like '%' #{description} '%'

select mname,mphone,maddress,description,createDate from merchant
mname like '%' #{mname} '%'
and mphone like '%' #{mphone} '%'
and maddress like '%' #{maddress} '%'
and description like '%' #{description} '%'
order by createDate desc limit #{skipCount},#{pageSize}
